item.description:
Kayak/Canoe Flint Pond, Shrewsbury

SUNDAY, November 4 at 1:00 (off the water by 3:00 at the latest for those who don't want to miss the Pats-Colts game!)

We'll meet at the Flint Pond State Boat Ramp on Rt. 20 in Shrewsbury, which is about 100 yards east of the Shrewsbury/Worcester line. The entrance to the boat ramp is at the traffic light at the intersection of Rt. 20 and Edgemere Blvd.

We'll paddle through the pond and into Lake Quinsigammond. Probably a short paddle since the weather is getting chilly... dress warm!
item.name: Kayak/Canoe Flint Pond, Shrewsbury
